lines.text: I think she might be, like, more of a god than this fuckhead is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, do you think or am I just, like, blindsided by bias.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And you know, desecrating people's beds that haven't been in them in 10 years. Not the best.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But you know, again, no one's really been in there, so it's okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, fuck those people, whatever.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do you feel about the Traveler?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You want to kick his ass.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: His curly fucking red hair and he's like, "I don't want to do it." Like, I hate you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm giving you permission, go ahead and punch him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, you're setting me up for fucking failure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I could try and punch him, but I'd just embarrass myself.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, so you want me to do it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, we'll see how this shit plays out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're punching the next time you see him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jester, hey, how are your cupcakes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you emerge with your cupcakes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hell, yeah, give me one of those now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go ahead and set up number of rooms at The Broken Stool. How long you want to pay these?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll have it paid, I don't know how long it's going to take, but just in case, I'll just put two weeks. That seems--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's was an intense Jay and Silent Bob energy, by the way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, I thought you said a gold and half a day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make it up to the rooms and, the Clay family divvy outs the spaces amongst their-- and like, the siblings all here are older, but there's a sweet innocence to the fact that their relationships and interactions are almost never developed beyond that adolescent relationship that they had with their parents with their parents with their kids.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But as they all go about the rooms and you guys let them know about.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go find my parents and my aunt.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was alone for a very long time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (as Constance) "I'm so sorry we left you, honey."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was not the last to stay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Please don't, don't carry the weight "of our mistakes upon your shoulders."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't think I've ever seen you stand so tall before."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think we all want to hear about them."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I-- These people, I can't wait to share them with you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would love to see what grows.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know I can say that to you, but I'd never say that to them. (chuckles)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to-- I'm going to say goodbye to the idiots and I'll be home soon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Don't tell your siblings, but "I think you're the only one who could've done this."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know, and it's going to be so hard not to tell them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I did not say that." (laughter) Corrin leans in and goes, "I'll make sure they get back fine "and in one piece as well."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "From what it seems, she's the only reason I'm here."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (as Clarabelle) "You got the look like you're leaving."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Trusting you to all take care of auntie and mom and dad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think Calliope'll back me up on that." Calliope's like, "Yeah, sure. I'll back him up."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I give my brother the pat hug.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I walk over and give Calliope a big hug.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whisper in her ear: The whistle tonight for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see her grin curl up on the side as she looks over towards Colton.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I got you something." She hands you the jar filled with all sorts of insects.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let them crawl up into the staff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And up my back and let them go everywhere, in my ear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to get the big straw hat out of the back of my-- just bury her in it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (thudding) Pulls it up a little bit so you can just see her eyes peeping underneath. She goes, "It smells weird."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Keep you incognito on your travel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Incognito." Pulls back over eyes again, turns and walks into her sister.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I love you all very much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see Clarabelle turns around and goes, "Love you, Caduceus." Calliope goes, "Love you, brother." And Colton just goes...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have a lot of siblings, dude.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nothing wired about that, I don't know what--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, we'll unpack that later. Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, well, I have one thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to cast the 6th-level spell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to beseech the Traveler for a person that can help me out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A very mobile messenger, if you will.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Doesn't have to be a fighter just something that can travel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're-- you're spending-- spending 10 minutes summoning a Planar Ally in the middle of The Broken Stool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll go into another one of the rooms.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you beseech the Traveler and what are you requesting? Like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, I know you're really busy and stuff, but this is super important, so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where Dwarven Forge will be displaying their next Kickstarter, Wildlands.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (New York accent) Boston, right? It's in Boston.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey you guys, we're going to do a live show this week.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (like the Hot Pockets jingle) ♪ Hot cover! ♪

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Got that de Rolo action in there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Somebody that can bamf a lot, maybe go, like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Transport via Plants, do something crazy, something that can move, you know?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For the fastest creature in D&D.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, I think I got something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you focus for a second and the words go out the voice responds with, "Hello dear."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm a bit, "I'm preoccupied at the moment, "but I think I've got an idea of someone "that could help you."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's wearing a very faint bit of tattered clothing on it and as it emerges, it, "(panting) "I have been sent to help you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tevas, I'm Jester, nice to meet you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's already, like, right there, grabbing your hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He shakes it and his hand blurs a little bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so I need a favor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you bamf between planes or worlds or plants? Or can you just walk around really fast?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so I pull out my dozen cupcakes that I just got.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just get past the brambles and then leave it. Okay?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You are really cool and I believe in you and-- do you want anything to help you on your journey, are you good are you safe, are you okay?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here, let me give you-- I don't want you to take anything from this dozen but here, have one of these.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Into the mouth and all over the somewhat knife-looking teeth. (slurps)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And just is gone out of the room.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's time that we were moving.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where are we in our timetable?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say, traveling through the city, I think it's probably midday, early afternoon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think he meant, like, a grand scale.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How many days until the meeting at sea?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could get to the boat today, if we wanted.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true. We could bamf to Nicodranas, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's one of our only options, really.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are approximately four weeks away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From Traveler Con. From the meeting--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's going to take some time on the sea. So.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have to get on that boat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get to Nicodranas and sail out, yeah?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is Orly meeting us and Nicodranas? He is, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We told him to wait there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you didn't give him any sort of additional messages to send him anywhere else.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am-- I know I'm loved at home, but I feel that I'm needed here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you are. Wait, were you questioning that? Don't question that, that's dumb. Come with us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We'll just be grateful for the Wild Mother to lend you to us for a bit more time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that is definitely her plan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, well, I'm not going to do it in the common room here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, in typically Mighty Nein fashion, we'll go find an alleyway.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will draw it up on the floor, on the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You manage to guard it off, like an impromptu bouncer, the friends trying to keep it chill, but also prevent anyone from going through.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You going to stay, for a bit? Keep the crew together.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm coming with you guys, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who would be willingly offer to split off from the party by themselves?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We all have to be high priests, y'all.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why do we keep forgetting this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll see where it goes there now that's happening.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Windy City on the high seas.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think they just named it once.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To the Lucidian Ocean towards the negotiation between the two warring nations.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We love you very much, and this is Thursday yet? Good night! (dramatic music)
